headline: Best Buy (BBY): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Over the past six months, Best Buy’s stock price fell to $72. Shareholders have lost 17% of their capital, disappointing when considering the S&P 500 was flat. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
